pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package is unilib x86_64 only. The dependencies are latest stable and more secure with the latest xorg-server-1.20.x.
For multilib support and feature complete driver, see the amdgpu-pro-lts package instead.
This package is preferred over the amdgpu-pro-lts package for security reasons.
Mesa OpenGL and Pro OpenGL are mutually exclusive.
The open-stack (with Mesa OpenGL) is recommended for consumer products. The pro-stack (with Pro OpenGL) is recommended for Radeon Pro products.
